parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Opens gear dialog for given unit. Alternatively use [[action]] command:
<code>[[player]] [[action]] ["Gear", [[player]]];</code>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''createGearDialog''' [unit, resource]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [unit, resource]: [[Array]] -

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> resource (Optional): [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[createGearDialog]] [player];
</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[createDialog]], [[createDisplay]]
</value></part></template>
